# Data Preparation

```{r}
# Importing all libraries
library(caret)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(randomForest)
library(lattice)
library(lubridate)
library(smotefamily)
library(ROSE)
library(tree)
library(snow)
library(caret)
library(doParallel)
library(vtable)
cl <- makePSOCKcluster(detectCores() -1)
registerDoParallel(cl)
set.seed(123)


```


